NAME's thirst for archaeo-technological knowledge drove HIM to spend years surveying abandoned data centers and studying ancient coding languages.
HECAP claimed to be one of the few who could piece together the tragedy of the past - and offer a path to the future.

ArtisticWeirdo41.title: Artistic weirdo
ArtisticWeirdo41.desc:
NAME grew up in a house near a bustling midworld metropolis.
HECAP was talented at art and creative work, but often acted strangely, and thus had few friends.

AdventurousWeirdo48.title: Adventurous weirdo
AdventurousWeirdo48.desc:
A creative but strange individual, NAME dedicated his life to his twin passions of medieval world history and high technology.
HECAP was fascinated by the idea of becoming a 'skyknight' with glittering armor and a giant sword.

ApprenticeOracle81.title: Apprentice oracle
ApprenticeOracle81.desc:
NAME was chosen at an early age by the village elders to keep the sacred rituals of the Oracle.
An irrepressibly curious child, NAME caused a religious crisis for HIS tribe when HE accidentally flipped a switch to open the "tombs" of the Gods - cryptosleep caskets inhabited by some very confused ancestors.

CasketBuilder57.title: Casket builder
CasketBuilder57.desc:
NAME was fascinated with cryosleep, and spent HIS life learning about the mysterious technology.
Working as an assembler on a midworld, NAME built an experimental prototype casket from discarded parts. Unfortunately, while HE was searching for the final component, HIS home was leveled by a bomb.

JunkyardMechanic0.title: Junkyard mechanic
JunkyardMechanic0.desc:
Left for dead at a young age, NAME was rescued by an old man who ran an urbworld junkyard. The old man forced NAME to do dangerous, demanding work.
NAME became very familiar with machines, but HE grew up with almost no other experiences.

MilitaryOfficer12.title: Military officer
MilitaryOfficer12.desc:
Obsessed with interstellar travel, NAME left HIS desolate life behind to join a military academy in hopes of becoming a pilot.
HECAP was trained in advanced combat and survival skills. While HE excelled in HIS studies, NAME was a loner and never cared about HIS crewmates.

Empath28.title: Empath
Empath28.desc:
NAME was an incredibly empathetic child, so much that HE was totally overwhelmed by simple social interactions. Once, HE stepped on a bug and felt so guilty HE cried for an hour.
NAME did try to use a gun one time, but it went very poorly, as the loud noise made HIM flinch uncontrollably.

FearfulChef79.title: Fearful chef
FearfulChef79.desc:
NAME was a excellent chef who worked in a high-end restaurant.
One day, HE left the stove on, and accidentally burned down the whole building. This event shook HIM so much that HE swore to never touch a stove again.

PetKeeper10.title: Pet keeper
PetKeeper10.desc:
NAME spent most of HIS childhood tending the animals HE had bought or rescued.
HECAP saw beauty in natural things more than fabricated objects, and chose the company of HIS animals over that of HIS peers.

Herpetologist38.title: Herpetologist
Herpetologist38.desc:
After a terrible mining accident, NAME set off into space in search of exotic new animal species.
HECAP hoped to leave HIS past behind and find long-lived companions. HECAP knew the pain of loss too well.

ShipChild6.title: Ship child
ShipChild6.desc:
NAME's family were space traders. One day, NAME's cryptosleep pod failed in transit. HECAP had to spend years awake on the ship as the other slept.
HECAP filled HIS days creating beautiful contraptions from the ship's cargo - but HE didn't learn a lot of basic planetary living skills.

ArtifactHunter88.title: Artifact hunter
ArtifactHunter88.desc:
NAME became depressed and lost interest in life. HECAP travelled from planet to planet, searching for psychic artifacts amid mechanoid ruins in the hope that they would cure the pain in HIS soul.
A steady trigger finger and careful planning kept NAME alive.

ChildResearcher33.title: Child researcher
ChildResearcher33.desc:
A frightfully intelligent child, NAME was kidnapped by a glitterworld corporation and forced to research technologies for weaponizing anti-matter.
HECAP vowed never to invent anything again.

Fugitive94.title: Fugitive
Fugitive94.desc:
NAME rebelled against the corporation HE worked for. HECAP failed, and was forced him to go on the run.
HECAP was always on the move, always leaving everything behind. HECAP tried to gain supporters for HIS cause, but failed due to HIS poor social skills.

VidtubeStar2.title: Vidtube star
VidtubeStar2.desc:
NAME's hobby was making videos for the popular video sharing service Vidtube. HECAP made everything from video game reviews to pasta cooking guides.
HECAP gained a over a million followers.

GunDealer81.title: Gun dealer
GunDealer81.desc:
NAME traded high-tech firearms between warring factions.
Over time, HE became very skilled at conducting product demonstrations and negotiating profitable deals.

AspiringPhysicist7.title: Aspiring physicist
AspiringPhysicist7.desc:
The daughter of an engineer and doctor, NAME's early life was intellectually rich. After visiting a physics lab, she decided she wanted to be a quantum physicist.
Bitten by a camel, kicked off a horse, and chased by dogs, NAME developed a fear of animals.

DeepSpaceSurveor17.title: Deep space surveor
DeepSpaceSurveor17.desc:
NAME was a deep space surveyor. She studied which worlds were the most suitable for colonization.
Her expeditions were met by hostile natives, green-painted space-women, and wannabe Greek gods. Surviving many firefights, she learned to build rudimentary lathes and rock cannons to fend off enemies.

Punk70.title: 龐克
Punk70.desc: NAME的童年都在向青少年兜售劣質私菸，填滿這些菸芯的大多只是一般的草屑。

GameDeveloper59.title: 遊戲開發者
GameDeveloper59.desc:
NAME是一名獨立遊戲開發者。
經歷過早期的成功之後，NAME的職涯迅速淪落為一個個糟糕的點子、一場場失敗的交易、一紙紙失敗的提案。
